trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of child controls in a table layout container.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de controles filho em um contêiner de layout de tabela.

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutControlCollection class represents the collection of all the child controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe TableLayoutControlCollection representa a coleção de todos os controles filho em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: This collection is exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa coleção é exposta pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can manage and individually manipulate members of the table layout panel through the TableLayoutControlCollection exposed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode gerenciar e manipular individualmente os membros do painel de layout de tabela por meio de TableLayoutControlCollection exposto pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutControlCollection class is a minor specialization of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> base class.
trans-unit.target: A classe TableLayoutControlCollection é uma especialização secundária da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>classe base.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Generally, the application programmer will not directly create instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, o programador de aplicativo não diretamente criará instâncias de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Instead, a reference to an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, uma referência a um existente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection>é retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> control that contains the control collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> controle que contém a coleção de controle.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified control to the collection and positions it at the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o controle especificado à coleção e posiciona-os na célula especificada.

trans-unit.source: With Add, you can specify the cell position of `control`.
trans-unit.target: Com adicionar, você pode especificar a posição da célula de `control`.

trans-unit.source: You can assign `control` to a specific cell by providing both the `column` and `row` parameters, or you can specify only the column or row value and let the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> place `control` at the next open cell.
trans-unit.target: Você pode atribuir `control` a uma célula específica, fornecendo ambos o `column` e `row` parâmetros, ou você pode especificar somente o valor de coluna ou linha e permitir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>colocar `control` na próxima célula aberta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is known as letting the control *flow* to its position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Isso é conhecido como permitir que o controle *fluxo* para sua posição no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: Set `column` to -1 if you want `control` to occupy a fixed row position.
trans-unit.target: Definir `column` como -1 se você quiser `control` ocupar uma posição de linha fixa.

trans-unit.source: Set `row` to -1 if you want `control` to occupy a fixed column position.
trans-unit.target: Definir `row` como -1 se você quiser `control` ocupar uma posição de coluna fixa.

trans-unit.source: If neither `column` nor `row` is -1, `control` will be added at the absolute position given by (`column`, `row`).
trans-unit.target: Se nem `column` nem `row` é -1, `control` será adicionado na posição absoluta fornecida pelo (`column`, `row`).

trans-unit.source: If you set both `column` and `row` to -1, `control` will flow to the first open position, with the specific flow behavior defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir ambos `column` e `row` como -1, `control` fluirá para a primeira posição aberta, com o comportamento específico de fluxo definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Isso é equivalente a usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To get to the actual current position of a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a posição atual real de um controle, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control state, including column or row spanning and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Esse método leva em conta todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>estado de controle, incluindo a coluna ou linha abrangência e quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=fullName>colocou um controle com seu `Column` e `Row` propriedades definidas como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The control to add.
trans-unit.target: O controle a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The column in which `control` will be placed.
trans-unit.target: A coluna na qual `control` serão colocados.

trans-unit.source: The row in which `control` will be placed.
trans-unit.target: A linha na qual `control` serão colocados.

trans-unit.source: Either column or row is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Either column or row is less than -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> that contains the controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> que contém os controles na coleção.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> that contains the controls in the current collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> que contém os controles na coleção atual.
